alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cape May County through 300 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dennisville, or 12 miles west of Ocean City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocean City, Somers Point, Woodbine, Sea Isle City, Avalon, Corbin City, Belleplain Forest, Beesleys Point, Seaville, Marmora, Dennisville, Goshen, Strathmere, Eldora and Cape May Court House. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 11 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic
